query:
SELECT 
  pu.statName,
  pu.statIncrease,
  JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') as upgradeType,
  JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.source') as source
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE p.name = 'Jarrett Allen'
AND pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
ORDER BY upgradeType, pu.statName
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT 
  pu.statName,
  pu.statIncrease,
  JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.upgradeType') as upgradeType,
  JSON_EXTRACT(pu.metadata, '$.source') as source
FROM player_upgrades pu
JOIN players p ON p.id = pu.playerId
WHERE p.name = 'Jarrett Allen'
AND pu.upgradeType = 'attribute'
ORDER BY upgradeType, pu.statName
